questions.question: This term refers to the use of computer-controlled machines to perform manufacturing tasks.
This type of CNC machine is used for cutting and shaping metal and other materials.
This term refers to the process of creating a 3D model of a part before machining it.
This type of CNC machine is used for cutting materials with a high-powered laser.
questions.answer: What is a CNC Laser Cutter?

questions.question: This term refers to the practice of using CNC machines to create custom parts and prototypes.
